author: Natacha Butler
title: French health official warns against easing virus restrictions
description: Health official says the virus threat remains high in response to government plans to begin reducing restrictions next month.
content:
A French health official has warned the virus threat remains high as the government plans to begin easing restrictions next month.
President Emmanuel Macron says the lockdown measures will be lifted in small stages from May 11 but there are concerns about ho… [+70 chars]
